name: Cu Sith Rey, the Carrier of Miracles
text:
Break: Put this card into your field.
Continuous: When this card is destroyed, search for a resonator with total cost 3 or less other than "Cu Sith Rey, the Carrier or Miracles" from your main deck, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
